name: Church_of_the_Good_Sheperd
text:
Church of the Good Sheperd
The Church of the Good Sheperd was a Lutheran church in Twin Peaks, Washington.
The church was led by Pastor Theodore Helmark and attended by the Briggs and Jennings families.
Behind the scenes
Twin Peaks: Access Guide to the Town says that the Palmer family also attends the Church of the Good Sheperd. However, the series indicates that Laura Palmer, since childhood, attended the church led by Clarence Brocklehurst, which Access Guide states to be Twin Peaks Episcopal.
